articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Arlette Saenz and Betsy Klein, CNN
articles.title: US to ease travel restrictions on fully vaccinated visitors from UK and European Union - CNN
articles.description: The United States plans to ease travel restrictions on all fully vaccinated foreign visitors starting in November, White House Covid-19 response coordinator Jeff Zients said Monday.

articles.author: Diksha Madhok, CNN Business
articles.title: French submarine dispute could torpedo EU-Australia trade talks - CNN
articles.description: France is threatening to block talks on a planned free trade agreement between Europe and Australia after the Australian government ditched a huge deal to buy French submarines.
